title: Looking for Retro Style Scrpt Fonts
content:
I have been hunting around far and low for a retro style font similar to that used throughout this site.

[http://shop.store.yahoo.com/rockscissorpaper/weddings1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090914152538/http:/shop.store.yahoo.com/rockscissorpaper/weddings1.html "http://shop.store.yahoo.com/rockscissorpaper/weddings1.html")

Hoping someone can help. Itâ€™s for wedding invites.
author: AbsolutelyGorgeous

comments.content: if you want more choices, check out [www.fontdiner.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090914152538/http:/www.fontdiner.com/ "www.fontdiner.com") or [the Jukebox collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20090914152538/http:/www.veer.com/products/vendor.aspx?vendor=JBT) from Veer or some of [the Blumelin scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090914152538/http:/www.veer.com/products/gallery.aspx?gallery=213) by Veer have a definate retro feel as well.
Reminds me of [Murray Hill](http://web.archive.org/web/20090914152538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/murray-hill-sh/) with less swashiness.
